title: Sausage and mushroom filo cases
ingredients: ['Filo cases', '8 sheets filo pastry', '125g melted butter', 'Filling', '1 tablespoon butter', '225g pork sausage, finely chopped', '450g mushrooms, diced', '1 dessertspoon minced garlic', '350g grated mozzarella cheese', '75g grated Parmesan cheese', '25g grated Pecorino Romano cheese']
